The Essentials:

[? Nvidia launches Nemotron 3 open agentic AI models.](https://qudata.com/en/news/nvidia-launches-open-model-family-agentic-ai/)

- NVIDIA's Nemotron 3 models use hybrid Mamba-Transformer MoE architecture, enabling efficient, accurate multi-agent AI with up to 1M token contexts.
- This design boosts throughput 4?, reduces token generation by 60%, and supports granular reasoning budget control for scalable AI workflows.
- Nemotron 3's open tools and datasets promote transparent, cost-effective AI development, poised to advance enterprise agentic applications globally.

[??? Odisha partners with OpenAI for AI training.](https://analyticsindiamag.com/ai-news-updates/odisha-partners-with-openai-to-train-students-and-officials-in-ai/)

- Odisha partners with OpenAI to train students and officials via structured AI programs and provide API credits for pilot projects.
- This collaboration enhances AI skills at scale, enabling AI-driven governance tools like the Government Productivity Co-Pilot.
- The initiative promotes responsible AI use, fostering local language applications and strengthening public service delivery in Odisha.

[? Meta releases SAM Audio for multimodal sound separation.](https://www.marktechpost.com/2025/12/17/meta-ai-releases-sam-audio-a-state-of-the-art-unified-model-that-uses-intuitive-and-multimodal-prompts-for-audio-separation/)

- Meta introduces SAM Audio, enhancing multimodal sound separation capabilities with advanced audio processing techniques.
- This innovation improves audio source isolation, benefiting applications in AR, VR, and multimedia content analysis.
- SAM Audio's integration promises future advancements in immersive tech, though scaling may pose computational challenges.

[?? OWASP issues first AI agent risk list.](https://www.techrepublic.com/article/news-owasp-ai-agent-risk-list/)

- OWASP released the first AI agent risk list, identifying key vulnerabilities in autonomous AI systems. This list highlights critical security gaps in AI agents, guiding risk management and compliance efforts. Adoption of these guidelines will enhance AI safety and trust, shaping future regulatory frameworks and industry standards.

[? LangChain launches Polly AI agent engineer for debugging.](https://blog.langchain.com/introducing-polly-your-ai-agent-engineer/)

- Polly, an AI agent engineer in LangSmith, debugs complex agent traces, analyzes conversations, and enhances prompt engineering efficiently.
- It addresses challenges in multi-step agent executions, long prompts, and multi-turn interactions, boosting development and debugging accuracy.
- Future updates aim to optimize experiments and prompts, advancing agent reliability while easing engineering complexities and scaling challenges.

[?? Kdnuggets shares Python scripts to automate daily tasks.](https://www.kdnuggets.com/5-useful-python-scripts-to-automate-boring-everyday-tasks)

- Five Python scripts automate repetitive tasks: file organizing, batch renaming, smart backups, duplicate detection, and screenshot sorting.
- These tools enhance productivity by leveraging file metadata, regex, hashing, and OCR for robust, customizable automation workflows.
- Adoption can streamline workflows across domains; challenges include dependency management and adapting scripts to varied user environments.
